original_text: And the Lord said to Satan, “Behold, all that he has is in your hand. Only against him do not stretch out your hand.” So Satan went out from the presence of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와께서 사탄에게 이르시되 내가 그의 소유물을 다 네 손에 맡기노라 다만 그의 몸에는 네 손을 대지 말지니라 사탄이 곧 여호와 앞에서 물러가니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to Satan,
all that he has is in your hand.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 소유가 네 손에 있느니라.

sentences.original_text: Only against him do not stretch out your hand.
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 그에게는 네 손을 대지 말라.

sentences.original_text: So Satan went out from the presence of the Lord.
